Symplicity | Front End Developer | Washington, DC (Arlington, VA) | ONSITE, VISA, https://www.symplicity.com/about/join-us/openings

Symplicity has helped guide more than 26 million students to their dream career. We build the worldâ€™s leading campus recruiting software deployed at over 1,100 colleges and also tools to help recruiters land entry-level talent at these universities.

Our stack: PHP, Typescript, Slim, MySQL, Angular, ElasticSearch, JavaScript

Interview process is a phone screen, then onsite or GTM interview with a take-home coding exercise.

Interested in chatting? Email engineering-careers@symplicity.com
